installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# BasePack Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

GREEN='\033[0;32m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
YELLOW='\033[0;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

apt-get update -qq
apt-get install -y unzip

BASEPACK_URL="https://cdn.pluginycs.pl/packages/basepack_210.zip"
BASEPACK_GITHUB="https://github.com/PluginyCS/BasePack/releases/latest"
BASEPACK_VERSION="2.1.0"

mkdir -p /mnt/server
chown -R $(whoami):$(whoami) /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "${NC}Downloading BasePack version${BLUE} ${BASEPACK_VERSION}${NC} from ${YELLOW}${BASEPACK_GITHUB}${NC}"
curl -sSL -o basepack.zip ${BASEPACK_URL}

if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then
    echo -e "${RED}Failed to download basepack.zip${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

echo -e "${BLUE}Extracting BasePack...${NC}"
unzip -oq basepack.zip -d /mnt/server

if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then
    echo -e "${RED}Failed to extract basepack.zip${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

rm -f basepack.zip

if [[ -f /mnt/server/reunion.cfg ]]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}Configuring reunion.cfg...${NC}"
    if [[ ! -z "${REUNION_HASH_SALT}" ]]; then
        sed -i '/^SteamIdHashSalt/d' /mnt/server/reunion.cfg
        echo "SteamIdHashSalt = ${REUNION_HASH_SALT}" >> /mnt/server/reunion.cfg
        echo -e "${GREEN}SteamIdHashSalt configured${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}No REUNION_HASH_SALT provided, skipping...${NC}"
    fi
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}reunion.cfg not found in BasePack${NC}"
fi

mkdir -p /mnt/server/cstrike
if [[ ! -f /mnt/server/cstrike/server.cfg ]]; then
    touch /mnt/server/cstrike/server.cfg
fi

echo -e "${RED}-----------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Installation completed...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}Thank you for using PluginyCS BasePack (ver. ${BASEPACK_VERSION})${NC}"
echo -e "${RED}-----------------------------------------${NC}"

variables.name: Game ID
variables.description: The ID corresponding to the game to download and run using HLDS. The HLDS server ID is 90. This should not be changed.

variables.name: Game Name
variables.description: The name corresponding to the game to download and run using HLDS. All HLDS server names are here - https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Server_Name_Enumeration

variables.name: Map
variables.description: The default map for the server.

variables.name: VAC Port
variables.description: Specifies the VAC port the server should use. Default is 26900.

variables.name: Steam Auth
variables.description: Steam authenticator code (not required for BasePack).

variables.name: Validate
variables.description: Validate game files during update (not used with BasePack).

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Auto update on restart (not used with BasePack).

variables.name: Reunion Hash Salt
variables.description: 32-character SteamIdHashSalt for reunion.cfg (recommended hex string). Generate with: openssl rand -hex 16

variables.name: Beta Branch
variables.description: Leave empty for the public branch (not used with BasePack).
